name: LipSmacker's MiniFight
description:
This is a fan game for LipSmacker made using a card game demo I made last month.

I had a few free hours today, and needed a boss for this game I'm making, so I made this for you. Thanks for the fun man, love watching ya.

Fair Warning: this looks awful on the inside. I made it using a card game demo I made, but I hardly changed any of the visuals.

Check LipSmacker out here: https://m.twitch.tv/lipsmacker_/home
